properties.title: Aramis Lab

description: Oral presentation of my current work on neurodegenerative diseases at a conference focusing on Bayesian statistics and MCMC methods application.

properties.title: Rotterdam Study
description: Application of new numerical methods to study longitudinal evolutions of biomarkers in the case on normal aging. The Rotterdam Study cohort gathered decades of clinical and imaging data of thousands of patients.
